internal.content:
While navigating using left(←) or right(→) arrow keys, the knob will move by one unit towards the left or right. ### States
#### Initial Default Initial value selected ![Initial default state](./images/slider-2.png)
#### Hover
![Hover states](./images/slider-3.png)

#### Active
![Active states](./images/slider-4.png)

#### New default When clicked outside ![New default state](./images/slider-5.png)
